Articles.Content:
Hi everyone,

Are there any working mods, or even any text challenges that have to do with a campaign mode, / parts costing money etc.

I've been looking around the forums, but haven't found any, but if there are any, if comeone could point me in the right direction, that would be great.
Look in the Challenge board. Occasionally, people will post their text campaigns there, although it could be two or three pages back.
Welcome to the community You should check out the planned features list: http://kspwiki.nexisonline.net/wiki/Planned_features they are planning things like parts costing money and mission control.
